definitions.text: keenly excited (especially sexually) or indicating excitement; - Bram Stoker
examples: his face all ablaze with excitement

definitions.text: lighted up by or as by fire or flame
examples: forests set ablaze (or afire) by lightning
even the car's tires were aflame

definitions.text: resembling flame in brilliance or color
lighted with red light as if with flames
examples: streets ablaze with lighted Christmas trees
